alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued September 21 at 12:48PM MDT until September 23 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 possible, coldest in the Bear River Valley. * WHERE...Wasatch Back, Bear Lake and Bear River Valley. * WHEN...From late Friday night through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Wasatch Back
